description: There’s a place outside Los Angeles where donkeys roam free, stumbling into backyard weddings. The creatures were the cause of headaches, until they became a cause of their own.
title: Welcome to Donkey Country, U.S.A.

description: Sweeping immigration changes by the Trump administration have resulted in the cancellation of naturalization ceremonies, the last step in the process of becoming a citizen.
title: One Step From Citizenship, Some Find It Eludes Their Grasp

description: Prosecutors say members of the Somali diaspora, a group with growing political power, were largely responsible. President Trump has drawn national attention to the scandal amid his crackdown on immigration.
title: How Fraud Swamped Minnesota’s Social Services System on Tim Walz’s Watch

description: Democrats zeroed in on utilities and affordability to win Republican support in upset elections in Georgia and Virginia. Can the same playbook work in 2026?
title: ‘The New Price of Eggs.’ The Political Shocks of Data Centers and Electric Bills

description: At an appearance in California, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth was noncommittal about releasing the full video of a U.S. military attack on a boat in the Caribbean.
title: Hegseth Skirts Questions About Releasing Video of Sept. 2 Boat Attack

description: The penalty was part of a fine imposed by the Biden administration after it determined the airline had failed to provide prompt customer service and refunds to passengers in 2022.
title: Trump Administration Waives $11 Million Southwest Airlines Fine

description: Officials said one person was killed and 20 others were poisoned after eating death cap mushrooms, which look and taste like safe mushrooms but can cause liver failure.
title: California Discourages Wild Mushroom Foraging After Fatal Outbreak

description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.
title: Map: 7.0-Magnitude Earthquake Shakes Alaska

description: Hamed Aleaziz, our immigration reporter, describes the sweeping changes the Trump administration has made that affect asylum seekers — people fleeing harm in their home countries — since the shooting of two National Guard members in Washington.
title: Trump’s New Crackdown on Asylum Seekers

description: A new architect will oversee President Trump’s vision for the East Wing ballroom. See what we know about the original design so far.
title: See the East Wing Design, Before Trump Changed Architects

description: Most supported the Trump administration’s tactics, but a few had deep reservations.
title: 6 Republican Voters on U.S. Strikes on Boats Suspected of Smuggling Drugs

description: A month before taking office, Helena Moreno is steering the city through a budget crisis and a Border Patrol enforcement operation that has immigrants in hiding.
title: The Mayor-Elect of New Orleans Is Already Awash in Challenges
